history.proof: intros X Y f T1 T2 H x Hin. unfold Included in *. unfold inverse_image in *. sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: intros X Y f T1 T2 H x Hin.
intros X Y f T1 T2 H x Hin.
exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y T1, T2 : Ensemble Y H : forall x : Y, In T1 x -> In T2 x x : X Hin : In [x : X | In T1 (f x)] x Unable to unify "T2 ?M1667" with "characteristic_function_abstraction (fun x : X => In T2 (f x)) x".

original: intros X Y f T1 T2 H x Hin. unfold Included in *. intros x0 H0. unfold inverse_image in *. simpl in *. apply H. apply H0. apply Hin. apply H0.
